body.p:
Louisville March 5th ^62^
Mr Tweets
Dr Sir

Being absent from home is the reason I did not receive your letter in relation to renewal of Com as Notary public,, can only say I want very much to get the renewal of the commission but owing to a series of misfortunes that has befallen me I am out of funds -- if you will rely on my word and send me the com I will remit you the amount in a short time
